name: Morning Yoga Stretch
description: A gentle yoga routine to start your day.
description1: Ideal for beginners and those looking to ease into their day.
description2: Focuses on stretching and mindful breathing.
tips: Focus on deep breathing and gentle stretches to awaken your body.

name: 5K Run Training
description: Interval training for improving your 5K run time.
description1: Designed to enhance running speed and endurance.
description2: Includes a mix of short sprints and longer runs.
tips: Incorporate interval training and rest days to improve speed and recovery.

name: HIIT Cardio Blast
description: High-intensity interval training for a quick cardio workout.
description1: Short bursts of intense exercise followed by brief rest periods.
description2: Aims to burn calories and improve heart health.
tips: Stay hydrated and maintain proper form during each high-intensity interval.

name: Beginner's Pilates
description: Pilates exercises for beginners to improve flexibility and strength.
description1: Focuses on core strength, posture, and flexibility.
description2: Ideal for those new to Pilates or looking for a gentle workout.
tips: Focus on your core and maintain steady, controlled movements.

name: Advanced Core Workout
description: Challenging exercises to strengthen your core muscles.
description1: Targets deep core muscles for improved strength and stability.
description2: Recommended for those with prior core training experience.
tips: Ensure proper form to avoid strain and maximize core engagement.

name: Meditation for Relaxation
description: Guided meditation to help you relax and reduce stress.
description1: Aims to calm the mind and ease anxiety.
description2: Suitable for beginners and those seeking stress relief.
tips: Create a calm environment and focus on your breath to enhance relaxation.

name: Full Body Strength Training
description: A strength training routine for the entire body.
description1: Incorporates exercises for all major muscle groups.
description2: Balances muscle building with overall endurance.
tips: Balance your workout across different muscle groups and include rest days.

name: Cycling Endurance Workout
description: Cycling exercises to build endurance and stamina.
description1: Focuses on long-distance cycling and stamina building.
description2: Ideal for cyclists looking to improve long ride performance.
tips: Gradually increase intensity and duration to build endurance effectively.

name: Swimming Technique Drills
description: Drills to improve your swimming technique and speed.
description1: Enhances stroke efficiency and aquatic agility.
description2: Suitable for swimmers looking to refine their technique.
tips: Concentrate on one drill at a time to refine technique and enhance efficiency.

name: Yoga for Flexibility
description: Yoga poses specifically for increasing flexibility.
description1: Targets major muscle groups to improve overall flexibility.
description2: Great for those looking to enhance their range of motion.
tips: Maintain a regular practice and be patient with your body's flexibility progress.
